headline.main: RUSSIANS IN KUBAN SEIZE VITAL POINT; Renewed Offensive in Caucasus Threatens to Split Nazis -- Other Fronts Slowed

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Thursday, April 1 -- Red Army troops, resuming their Kuban River offensive as the swampy terrain along the stream dries, have captured a base of utmost importance to the remnants of the Axis Caucasus army holding the Novorossiisk bridgehead, the Russians announced today.
abstract: USSR troops take Anastasevsk, vital Kuban point; other fronts slowed
